Young people have the megaphone. Here’s what they want everyone else to hearAcross the country, people in their teens and early 20s are organizing protests, vigils, and rallies. They say lasting change will take work from people of all ages.

Will 2020 crises permanently derail community college students’ educations? More so than at other colleges, the repercussions of the pandemic have reverberated deeply at Bunker Hill Community College, a school that serves primarily part-time students who juggle families and jobs, and even in normal times struggle with basic needs.

Patients are fearful.

How Rayshard Brooks was fatally shot by Atlanta policeBrooks had fallen asleep in his vehicle at a Wendy’s drive-through Friday, and was fatally shot by police after failing a sobriety test and grabbing a Taser from an officer. The New York Times analyzed eyewitness videos and security camera footage of the events to determine what happened in the minutes preceding Brooks’ death. This chronology uses the time-stamp displayed on police body camera and dash camera footage.

Will 2020 crises permanently derail community college students’ educations? More so than at other colleges, the repercussions of the pandemic have reverberated deeply at Bunker Hill Community College, a school that serves primarily part-time students who juggle families and jobs, and even in normal times struggle with basic needs.

The move has sparked outrage throughout the surrounding communities, where a disproportionate number of residents have long suffered elevated levels of respiratory and cardiovascular diseases.

How Rayshard Brooks was fatally shot by Atlanta police27-year-old Brooks had fallen asleep in his vehicle at a Wendy’s drive-through before police officers arrived, resulting in a struggle that ended with his death late Friday. The New York Times analyzed eyewitness videos and security camera footage of the events to determine what happened in the minutes preceding Brooks’ death.
